content:
# Factorio Agent Report (Steps 120-127)

## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Functional Iron Processing Line at (37.0, 82.0)
(Throughput stable)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (37.0, 82.0) (fuel: 13 coal)
- Stone furnace at (37.0, 84.0) (fuel: 37 coal)
- Burner inserter at (38.5, 84.5) (fuel: 21 coal)
- Primary output chest at (39.5, 84.5) storing 210 iron plates
- Secondary output chest at (40.5, 84.5) (empty)
- Current throughput: 19 iron plates per minute

### Optimized Copper Production Facility at (-46.0, 70.0)
(Stable operation)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (-46.0, 70.0) (fuel: 14 coal)
- Stone furnace at (-46.0, 72.0) (fuel: 32 coal)
- Output chest at (-45.5, 75.5) storing 91 copper plates
- Current throughput: 6 copper plates per minute

### Transport Belt Factory at (37.5, 87.5)
(Partially operational)
Consists of:
- Assembling machine 2 at (37.5, 87.5) (unpowered)
- Configured for transport belt production
- Missing power connection
- Missing input inserter connection
- Contains recipe but no materials

## ERROR TIPS

### Persistent Assembler Placement Issues
- Multiple failed placements at blocked positions
- Implement pre-placement area scanning
- Maintain minimum spacing requirements (3x3 for assemblers)
- Document planned factory layouts before building

### Inserter Connection Problems
- Repeated failures at (38.5, 87.5)
- Verify inserter placement positions relative to assemblers
- Ensure proper spacing between inserters and other entities
- Consider alternative inserter positions when blocked

### Power System Deficiencies
- Assembler remains unpowered at (37.5, 87.5)
- Implement power grid planning before assembler placement
- Document power pole placement protocols
- Consider burner-based solutions when power unavailable

### Distance Management Issues
- Power pole placement too far (step 126)
- Maintain proximity during construction operations
- Implement movement verification before placement attempts
- Document maximum operational distances

### Existing Error Prevention (maintained)
- Continue thorough cleanup procedures
- Maintain position verification
- Document all placement attempts
- Verify entity spacing requirements

## NAMESPACE

No functions have been defined by the agent yet.
